description.english: Defeat Captain King Boulder, and get the Regal Medal!
description.french: Bats le capitaine King Boulder et obtiens la médaille royale !
description.italian: Sconfiggi il capitano King Boulder e ottieni la medaglia reale!
description.koreana: 킹 볼더 대장을 물리치고 왕실 메달을 획득하세요!
description.spanish: ¡Derrota al capitán King Boulder y consigue la medalla regia!
description.schinese: 击败国王·波尔德，获得皇家勋章！
description.japanese: キャプテン・キングBを倒して、王家のメダルを入手せよ！
description.brazilian: Derrote o capitão King Boulder e ganhe a medalha régia!

description.english: Defeat Captain Zephyra and get the Smite Medal!
description.french: Bats la capitaine Zephra et prends la médaille du jugement !
description.italian: Sconfiggi Zephra e prendi la medaglia del giudizio!
description.spanish: Derrota a Zephra y gana la medalla de ira.
description.schinese: 打败泽芙拉，赢得惩戒勋章！
description.japanese: キャプテン・ゼフラを倒し、制裁のメダルを手に入れろ！
description.brazilian: Derrote Zephra e receba a medalha da ira!

description.english: Defeat Captain Mizu and get the Typhoon Medal!
description.french: Bats Mizu et gagne la médaille du typhon !
description.italian: Sconfiggi Mizu e guadagna la medaglia del tifone!
description.koreana: 미즈를 무찌르고 태풍 메달을 손에 넣으세요!
description.spanish: Derrota a Mizu y obtén la medalla de tifón.
description.schinese: 击败水队长，收集台风勋章！
description.japanese: キャプテン・ワタを倒して、津波のメダルをゲットせよ！
description.brazilian: Derrote Mizu e conquiste a medalha do tufão!

description.english: Defeat Captain Alan and get the Stalker Medal!
description.french: Bats le capitaine Alan pour obtenir la médaille du traqueur !
description.italian: Sconfiggi Alan per ottenere la medaglia del segugio!
description.spanish: Derrota a Alan para conseguir la medalla de acecho.
description.schinese: 打败艾伦，获得潜行者的勋章。
description.japanese: キャプテン・アレンを倒し、追跡者のメダルを獲得せよ！
description.brazilian: Derrote Alan e fique com a medalha do perseguidor!

description.english: Find a hidden event with a low encounter rate.
description.french: Découvre un événement rare et bien caché.
description.italian: Trova un evento nascosto con bassa probabilità.
description.koreana: 등장 확률이 낮은 숨겨진 이벤트를 발견하세요.
description.spanish: Encuentra un evento oculto con baja probabilidad.
description.schinese: 找到一个极低概率触发的隐藏事件。
description.japanese: 低確率で発生する隠しイベントを発見せよ。
description.brazilian: Ache um evento secreto com chance raríssima!

description.english: Defeat Champion Coppra in the ultimate battle!
description.french: Bats Coppra dans le combat ultime et deviens champion !
description.spanish: ¡Derrota a Coppra en la batalla final y sé el campeón!
description.schinese: 在最终战中击败冠军科普拉！
description.japanese: チャンピオン・コップラを最終決戦で倒せ！
description.brazilian: Derrote Coppra na batalha final e vire o campeão!

description.japanese: ダイヤモンド・トリオを打ち破れ。

description.english: Upgrade your drill arms at the blacksmith!
description.french: Améliore tes bras foreuses chez le forgeron !
description.italian: Potenzia i bracci trapano dal fabbro!
description.spanish: ¡Mejora tus brazos taladro en la herrería!
description.schinese: 在铁匠铺升级你的钻头手臂！
description.japanese: 鍛冶屋でドリルアームを強化しよう！

description.english: Stop the HIVE and Mal Be-ol!
description.french: Stoppe le HIVE et Mal Be-ol !
description.spanish: ¡Detén a la COLMENA y a Mal Be-ol!
description.schinese: 阻止蜂巢与玛尔·贝奥尔的阴谋！
description.japanese: ハイブとマル・ベオルを阻止せよ！
description.brazilian: Derrote a COLMEIA e Mal Be-ol!

description.english: Use the sand highway to fast-travel.
description.french: Utilise l'autoroute de sable pour voyager rapidement.
description.italian: Usa l'autostrada di sabbia per viaggiare velocemente.
description.spanish: Viaja rápido por la autopista de arena.
description.schinese: 使用沙之高速公路快速旅行。
description.japanese: 砂のハイウェイでファストトラベルを使え！
description.brazilian: Use a estrada de areia pra viajar rapidinho.

description.english: Defeat Gleo for the final time!
description.japanese: グレオとの最終決戦に勝利せよ！

description.english: Punch Nester. Just walk up and give him a good ol' knuckle sandwich! It's totally fine, lol. :)
description.italian: Dai un pugno a Nester. Te lo sei meritato.
description.spanish: Golpea a Nester. Solo acércate y dale un puñetazo.
description.schinese: 揍内斯特一拳。放心，这没问题（笑）。
description.japanese: ネスターにパンチしろ！これは合法です。たぶん。
description.brazilian: Dê um soco no Nester. Pode confiar. ;)

displayName.english: Oh no! Our TV! It's broken!

description.english: Break the TV in your bedroom.
description.french: Casse la télé dans ta chambre.
description.italian: Rompi la TV nella tua stanza.
description.spanish: Rompe la televisión de tu habitación.
description.japanese: 自室のテレビを破壊せよ。
description.brazilian: Destrua a TV no seu quarto.

displayName.japanese: 秘密のトンネーーール！

description.english: Unlock the door on the surface.
description.french: Déverrouille la porte à la surface.
description.spanish: Desbloquea la puerta en la superficie.

description.english: Finish the game on hard mode.
description.french: Finis le jeu en mode difficile.
description.italian: Completa il gioco in modalità difficile.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en modo difícil.
description.schinese: 在困难模式下通关游戏。
description.japanese: ハードモードでゲームをクリアせよ。
description.brazilian: Zere o jogo no modo difícil.

description.english: Finish the entire game without taking any damage. A challenge for the most dedicated fighters.
description.french: Termine le jeu sans prendre de dégâts !
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza subire danni.
description.spanish: Termina el juego sin recibir daño.
description.schinese: 完整通关游戏且不受任何伤害。
description.japanese: ノーダメージでゲーム全体をクリアせよ。
description.brazilian: Zere o jogo sem levar um arranhão!

description.english: Finish the entire game without getting a game over!
description.french: Termine le jeu sans aucun game over !
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza mai morire!
description.spanish: Completa el juego sin morir ni una vez.
description.japanese: 一度もゲームオーバーにならずにクリアしよう！
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo sem morrer nenhuma vez!

description.english: Finish the game in less than three hours.
description.french: Termine le jeu en moins de trois heures.
description.italian: Termina il gioco in meno di tre ore.
description.spanish: Termina el juego en menos de tres horas.
description.schinese: 三小时内完成整个游戏。
description.japanese: 3時間以内にゲームをクリアしよう！
description.brazilian: Zere o jogo em menos de 3 horas.
